characters.name: Darth Vader
characters.summary: Darth Vader is a fictional character in the Star Wars franchise.

characters.name: Luke Skywalker
characters.summary: Luke Skywalker is a fictional character and the main protagonist of the original film trilogy of the Star Wars franchise.

characters.name: Princess Leia
characters.summary: Princess Leia is a fictional character in the Star Wars franchise, portrayed in films by Carrie Fisher.
